channel.title: [TUT] Making Object's teleport you. [TUT]

item.title: [TUT] Making Object's teleport you. [TUT]
item.dc:creator: @360_Elite_Ex 360 Elite Ex
item.description:
@360_Elite_Ex wrote:

Welcome and thank you for your time for readything is tutorial. please dont flame idk if this is set out right but here it is.

Source used: I used abit of sources and all of them worked not tryed delta.

difficult 1/10

Stuff Needed: Keybored , Mouse , Brain and Programming or java or even coding any you like.

Here goes

Step 1: FIRST OPEN client.java

Step 2: Press On your keybored CTRL + F

case 1765:

Should find somthing like this:

case 1765:
if (objectX == 3017 && objectY == 3849) {
teleportToX = 2773;
teleportToY = 9341;
sendMessage("You climb down the ladder to find a secret cave!");
}
break;

If you cant find that then try something that tele’s you in your Privarte server

Step 3: After you found it look for a break;
and under that add.

case object here:
if(objectX == xxxx && objectY == yyyy)
				{
					teleportToX = XXXX;
					teleportToY = YYYY;
					sendMessage("YOUR TEXT HERE");
break;			}

Ok i wikll explain it here the lower case xxxx mean the the object say like a book case was in position x 3245 y 4243 in the lower case xxxx i would put 3245 because thats its positions and the same with the yyyy its like the x:coord and the y:coord…and the capital XXXX is where you wanna go like say teleportToX = 2343;
same with YYYY teleportTo = 3351;

Step 4(dont need to do if dont need ) how to add an object when it teleports you

case object here:
if(objectX == xxxx && objectY == yyyy)
				{
					teleportToX = XXXX;
					teleportToY = YYYY;
                                                                addItem(itemid, amount);
					sendMessage("YOUR TEXT HERE");
break;			}

here is exlanation itemid means the item you want to give when you tele like a ant-dragon sheild if yu tele to king black dragon and the amount means where if you want to give it 4 of those items then you may. just might no work acoording to plan

Step 5: (must do) save and compile.

CREDITS = [shadow=red,left]ME[/shadow].

Read full topic
